article_html: Police in Brazil fire percussion grenades inside the Estádio Castelão arena during a riot as fans of teams Ceará and Fortaleza fought after the match ended. The violence was sparked by a 2-2 result that meant Fortaleza won the Ceara state championship title on aggregate. Fortaleza fans invaded the pitch to celebrate but were attacked their rivals with sticks and parts of the World Cup stadium
text: Police in Brazil fire percussion grenades inside the Estádio Castelão arena during a riot as fans of teams Ceará and Fortaleza fought after the match ended. The violence was sparked by a 2-2 result that meant Fortaleza won the Ceara state championship title on aggregate. Fortaleza fans invaded the pitch to celebrate but were attacked their rivals with sticks and parts of the World Cup stadium
title: Police fire percussion grenades at rioting fans in Brazil – video
